subject: Football
Drunken and Reckless Driving
lead_paragraph: Donte’ Stallworth said he felt he had done “irreparable harm” to the family of the man he killed while driving drunk, and was ready to accept whatever ruling Roger Goodell makes.
snippet: Donte’ Stallworth said he felt he had done “irreparable harm” to the family of the man he killed while driving drunk, and was ready to accept whatever ruling Roger Goodell makes.
